Morx's Mushrooms
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 3 Archive (PS2): Locales: Morx (The Big Tree Forest): Morx's Mushrooms
By Tecno Dragon on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 06:38 pm:

Hey I was training in morx and someone stole all the mushrooms!! whats with this?

By Crystal Pixie on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 06:49 pm:

Just happened to me! A young boy will come, you will fight a Beaclon and ummm, I won so the next week his gradmother or whatever comes and gives you the mushrooms. The next week after that he gives you an Item, OK?

By ChetFlavin on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 07:19 pm:

I noticed that when the mushrooms were gone, your monsters reaction to being fed Mushrooms (the ones that promote evolution) is a rather joyous one. Maybe it was just my monster, which was a Ruby, but normally he hated mushrooms but while they were gone he loved em. Also since the mushrooms were gone you couldn't perform the normal training tasks, except!the ones found such as tunnel and i think the otherone I found was light.

By Tecno Dragon on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 07:23 pm:

Yeah I got through it, the same kid came to a touney i fought in also with the same monster. He also showed up as a rival and gave me some sap.

By Trickster on Friday, September 28, 2001 - 07:41 pm:

I'm pretty sure you can also practice the regular speed training, at least, if not others. (Basically just whatever doesn't require a mushroom. The speed training involves jumping up the tree.)

By Crystal Pixie on Saturday, September 29, 2001 - 04:37 am:

Speed traing works. I tried it. Ummm, I think Intellegence also works it's up in a tree.

By John Hawley on Saturday, September 29, 2001 - 03:42 pm:

Note: it is NOT necessary to win the battle to get your mushrooms back and get the item. It may however change the item you get.
